00029 #include "GetCurrentWorkingDirectory.hpp"
00030 
00031 #include <cstdlib>
00032 #include <cerrno>
00033 
00034 #include "Exception.hpp"
00035 
00036 std::string GetCurrentWorkingDirectory()
00037 {
00038     size_t bufsize = 1000;
00039     char* p_buffer = NULL;
00040     while (true)
00041     {
00042         p_buffer = (char*) malloc(bufsize);
00043         if (!p_buffer)
00044         {
00045 #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00046             // Rather a tricky one to cover...
00047             EXCEPTION("Run out of memory to allocate CWD buffer");
00048 #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00049         }
00050         if (getcwd(p_buffer, bufsize) == p_buffer)
00051         {
00052             break;
00053         }
00054 #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00055         // Also rather a tricky one to cover...
00056         else
00057         {
00058             free(p_buffer);
00059             if (errno != ERANGE)
00060             {
00061                 EXCEPTION("Unable to determine current working directory");
00062             }
00063             bufsize *= 2;
00064         }
00065 #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00066     }
00067 
00068     std::string cwd(p_buffer);
00069     free(p_buffer);
00070     return cwd;
00071 }
